Runner

Although I started running semi-regularly when we moved to the Fens in 2006, it wasn’t until our sojourn in Amsterdam (2011-12) that I began to take it seriously.

The flat terrain and beautiful surroundings encouraged me to increase my distances to ten miles or more at a time, but without a goal to work towards it became harder and harder to motivate myself to continue.

So I signed up for the Amsterdam marathon.

Training for that event took me even further afield, and the event itself — with 33,000 other runners — was a fantastic experience. I’ve since completed two half-marathons, and will be looking for the next challenge soon.
